name: pontoon
content:
pontoon noun
(BRIDGE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a small, flat boat or a metal structure of a similar shape used especially to form or support a temporary floating bridge: Military engineers hurriedly constructed a pontoon bridge across the river.
AndrewJShearer/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
